bill_title: provide for additional consumer protections by requiring the attorney general to share certain information related to consumer complaint investigations on contractors.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for additional consumer protections by requiring the attorney general to share certain information related to consumer complaint investigations on contractors. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The attorney general shall maintain a list of contractor companies under investigation due to a consumer complaint. The list shall include the name of the company and the basis of the investigation as well as the disposition of any such investigation. The attorney general shall inform a consumer whether a specific company is currently under investigation on request by the consumer. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.093 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
